"https://api.github.com/users/Paindar","html_url":"https://github.com/Paindar","followers_url":"https://api.github.com/users/Paindar/followers","following_url":"https://api.github.com/users/Paindar/following{/other_user}","gists_url":"https://api.github.com/users/Paindar/gists{/gist_id}","starred_url":"https://api.github.com/users/Paindar/starred{/owner}{/repo}","subscriptions_url":"https://api.github.com/users/Paindar/subscriptions","organizations_url":"https://api.github.com/users/Paindar/orgs","repos_url":"https://api.github.com/users/Paindar/repos","events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/Paindar/events{/privacy}","received_events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/Paindar/received_events","type":"User","site_admin":false},"content_type":"application/octet-stream","state":"uploaded","size":28996825,"download_count":70,"created_at":"2018-07-14T07:21:54Z","updated_at":"2018-07-14T07:25:16Z","browser_download_url":"https://github.com/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/download/1.0.7/AcademyCraft-1.0.7.jar"}],"tarball_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/tarball/1.0.7","zipball_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/zipball/1.0.7","body":"#English\r\n\r\nThisupdatewill(hopefully)bethelastversionof1.7.10.LaterupdateswillfocusonnewerMCversions.\r\n\r\n##Bugfixes\r\n\r\n*Theindicatordoesn'tdisappearwhenPenetrationTeleportproficiencyisnearfull.\r\n*OptimizedsomepoorEnglish(Thank@MrBenjaminBowmanforhelping)andJapanesetranslations.\r\n*Sometimesblocksaheadwillnotbedestroyed.\r\n*Typingissue/killinVectorDeviation/Reflectwillfillitsproficiency.\r\n*Wrongenergyandotherdatadisplayinmachine.\r\n*HUDwon'tdisappearwhenusingBodyIntensifyandoverloaded.\r\n\r\n##Features\r\n\r\n*ThehigherproficiencyofScatterBombis,themorelightballcanaimtargetautomatically.\r\n*DirectShockwillbeaccompaniedbyaccuratecollectionwhenit'sproficiencyisfull.\r\n*Removeversioncheck.\r\n*Addnewmachine:AbilityInterfererBlock.\r\n\r\n#简体中文\r\n\r\n对于1.7.10，这将（大概率）是AcademyCraft的最后一个版本。我们之后将会将精力集中在更新版本的MC上。\r\n\r\n##BUG修复\r\n\r\n*当[穿透传送]熟练度接近满时出现的指示器不消失\r\n*优化了一些不佳的日文和英文翻译\r\n*修复了一定概率情况下面前的方块不会被技能破坏的问题\r\n*开着[矢量反射]和[矢量偏移]的情况下打出指令/kill会使技能熟练度和经验立刻变满\r\n*虚能融合机虚相位液体容量显示错误\r\n*当过载时[肢体强化]的HUD不消失\r\n\r\n##特性\r\n\r\n*电子弹散射的熟练度越高，就有越多的光球可以自动选择攻击目标\r\n*集束冲击熟练度达到满之后将附带精准采集\r\n*暂时移除AC的版本检查功能\r\n*完成了能力干涉机\r\n"},{"url":"https://api.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/4948124","assets_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/4948124/assets","upload_url":"https://uploads.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/4948124/assets{?name,label}","html_url":"https://github.com/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/tag/1.0.6","id":4948124,"node_id":"MDc6UmVsZWFzZTQ5NDgxMjQ=","tag_name":"1.0.6","target_commitish":"master","name":"1.0.6","draft":false,"author":{"login":"Paindar","id":16387007,"node_id":"MDQ6VXNlcjE2Mzg3MDA3","avatar_url":"https://avatars2.githubusercontent.com/u/16387007?v=4","gravatar_id":"","url":"https://api.github.com/users/Paindar","html_url":"https://github.com/Paindar","followers_url":"https://api.github.com/users/Paindar/followers","following_url":"https://api.github.com/users/Paindar/following{/other_user}","gists_url":"https://api.github.com/users/Paindar/gists{/gist_id}","starred_url":"https://api.github.com/users/Paindar/starred{/owner}{/repo}","subscriptions_url":"https://api.github.com/users/Paindar/subscriptions","organizations_url":"https://api.github.com/users/Paindar/orgs","repos_url":"https://api.github.com/users/Paindar/repos","events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/Paindar/events{/privacy}","received_events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/Paindar/received_events","type":"User","site_admin":false},"prerelease":false,"created_at":"2016-12-17T14:24:50Z","published_at":"2016-12-17T14:39:45Z","assets":[{"url":"https://api.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/assets/2843283","id":2843283,"node_id":"MDEyOlJlbGVhc2VBc mbdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/tag/1.0.5","id":4886971,"node_id":"MDc6UmVsZWFzZTQ4ODY5NzE=","tag_name":"1.0.5","target_commitish":"master","name":"1.0.5","draft":false,"author":{"login":"Paindar","id":16387007,"node_id":"MDQ6VXNlcjE2Mzg3MDA3","avatar_url":"https://avatars2.githubusercontent.com/u/16387007?v=4","gravatar_id":"","url":"https://api.github.com/users/Paindar","html_url":"https://github.com/Paindar","followers_url":"https://api.github.com/users/Paindar/followers","following_url":"https://api.github.com/users/Paindar/following{/other_user}","gists_url":"https://api.github.com/users/Paindar/gists{/gist_id}","starred_url":"https://api.github.com/users/Paindar/starred{/owner}{/repo}","subscriptions_url":"https://api.github.com/users/Paindar/subscriptions","organizations_url":"https://api.github.com/users/Paindar/orgs","repos_url":"https://api.github.com/users/Paindar/repos","events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/Paindar/events{/privacy}","received_events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/Paindar/received_events","type":"User","site_admin":false},"prerelease":false,"created_at":"2016-11-25T16:25:12Z","published_at":"2016-12-11T06:03:15Z","assets":[],"tarball_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/tarball/1.0.5","zipball_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/zipball/1.0.5","body":"#English\n\nForsomereason,AcademyCraft'supdatewillbestalled.\nOriginallyplannedfor1.1.0launchofthemedicinesystemstranded,1.0.5willbeabugfixversion.\n\n##Feature\n\nTwoofourleadauthorsarenotcurrentlyinvolvedinAcademyCraftupdates,sononewfeature.\n\n##Enhancement\n\nDatacapacitydevelopmentmachineisshownbyroundingdowntorounding,topreventthedevelopmentofplayersmisleading.\nSynchronizationoftheserverandclientdatafilestopreventtheclientandtheserverdatainconsistencieshaveanunexpectedexception.\n\n##Bugfixes\n\nFixedsomedata.\nFixedaproblemwheretheclientcrashedwhenplayerteleportedtootherworld.\nFixedShiftTeleportconsumedtwoitemsperuse.\nFixedvectorreflectioneffectscouldnotclosenaturally.\nFixedvectorreflectioneffectswon'tdisappearafterre-enteredagame.\nFixedfailureofsomeskillsofteleporterwhenusedinminecart.\n\n#简体中文\n\n由于某些原因，AcademyCraft的更新将会陷入停滞。\n原计划于1.1.0推出的药物系统搁浅，1.0.5将是一个bugfix版本。\n\n##新特性\n\n我们的两位主力回老家结婚去了（大雾），新特性暂无。\n\n##改进\n\n能力开发机中的进度由四舍五入改为向下取整，以防止对玩家开发造成误导。\n同步了服务端和客户端的数据文件，以防止客户端与服务端数据不一致而产生不可预料的异常。\n\n##Bug修复\n\n修正了部分能力系数据。\n修复坐标传送到部分世界时客户端崩溃的问题。\n修复转移传送一次消耗两个物品的问题。\n修复矢量反射特效无法自然关闭的问题。\n修复矢量反射在退出游戏重新进入后特效不消失的问题。\n修复坐在矿车上部分传送使技能失效的问题。\n"},{"url":"https://api.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/3827839","assets_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/3827839/assets","upload_url":"https://uploads.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/3827839/assets{?name,label}","html_url":"https://github.com/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/tag/1.0.4","id":3827839,"node_id":"MDc6UmVsZWFzZTM4Mjc4Mzk=","tag_name":"1.0.4","target_commitish":"master","name":"1.0.4","draft":false,"author":{"login":"KSkun","id":5047602,"node_id":"MDQ6VXNlcjUwNDc2MDI=","avatar_url":"https://avatars2.githubusercontent.com/u/5047602?v=4","gravatar_id":"","url":"https://api.github.com/users/KSkun","html_url":"https://github.com/KSkun","followers_url":"https://api.github.com/users/KSkun/followers","following_url":"https://api.github.com/users/KSkun/following{/other_user}","gists_url":"https://api.github.com/users/KSkun/gists{/gist_id}","starred_url":"https://api.github.com/users/KSkun/starred{/owner}{/repo}","subscriptions_url":"https://api.github.com/users/KSkun/subscriptions","organizations_url":"https://api.github.com/users/KSkun/orgs","repos_url":"https://api.github.com/users/KSkun/repos","events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/KSkun/events{/privacy}","received_events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/KSkun/received_events","type":"User","site_admin":false},"prerelease":false,"created_at":"2016-08-06T09:01:10Z","published_at":"2016-08-06T09:50:27Z","assets":[{"url":"https://api.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/assets/2104223","id":2104223,"node_id":"MDEyOlJlbGVhc2VBc3NldDIxMDQyMjM=","name":"AcademyCraft-1.0.4.jar","label":null,"uploader":{"login":"KSkun","id":5047602,"node_id":"MDQ6VXNlcjUwNDc2MDI=","avatar_url":"https://avatars2.githubusercontent.com/u/5047602?v=4","gravatar_id":"","url":"https://api.github.com/users/KSkun","html_url":"https://github.com/KSkun","followers_url":"https://api.github.com/users/KSkun/followers","following_url":"https://api.github.com/users/KSkun/following{/other_user}","gists_url":"https://api.github.com/users/KSkun/gists{/gist_id}","starred_url":"https://api.github.com/users/KSkun/starred{/owner}{/repo}","subscriptions_url":"https://api.github.com/users/KSkun/subscriptions","organizations_url":"https://api.github.com/users/KSkun/orgs","repos_url":"https://api.github.com/users/KSkun/repos","events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/KSkun/events{/privacy}","received_events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/KSkun/received_events","type":"User","site_admin":false},"content_type":"application/octet-stream","state":"uploaded","size":28803852,"download_count":2277,"created_at":"2016-08-06T09:48:14Z","updated_at":"2016-08-06T09:50:20Z","browser_download_url":"https://github.com/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/download/1.0.4/AcademyCraft-1.0.4.jar"}],"tarball_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/tarball/1.0.4","zipball_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/zipball/1.0.4","body":"#English\n\nAcademyCraft1.0.4bringsaboutsomeenhancementsandbugfixes.Theskillsofelectromasterarerewritteninscalaandimprovedforusing.\n\n##Feature\n-Whichworldsareabletodestroyblocksareconfigurablewhenyoudisabledblockdestroying\n-NowVectorManipulationcategoryhasitsownachievements\n\n##Enhancement\n-Correctsometyposinconfigfile\n-RewriteElectroMastercategoryinscalalanguageanduseContext,abetterutiltoprocessnetworkcommunication\n\n##Bugfixes\n-Fixedpaintingsanditemframesdamagedwhendisabledblockdestroying\n-FixedVecReflection/Deviationcan'treflectEntitySmallFireballorEntityLargeFireball\n-FixedVecReflection/DeviationreflectsExperienceOrbs\n-FixedDataTerminalappcountalways0\n-FixedskilleffectsofElectroMasterisinvisiblewhenplayingMP\n\n#简体中文\n\nAcademyCraft1.0.4带来了一些细节改进和bug修复。电击使能力的技能使用scala语言重写并且根据使用改进了。\n\n##新特性\n-当你禁止破坏方块的时候，你可以指定哪些世界是允许破坏方块的（设置例外）了\n-矢量操作能力现在也有成就了\n\n##改进\n-校正了配置文件中的一些语言错误\n-用scala语言重写了电击使的技能，并且使用了Context（更好的处理网络通信的工具）\n\n##Bug修复\n-修复了禁止破坏方块时图画和物品框会被破坏\n-修复了矢量反射/偏移技能不能影响火球和大火球\n-修复了矢量反射/偏移技能会反射经验球\n-修复了数据终端的App数总为0\n-修复了电击使技能特效在多人游戏中不可见\n"},{"url":"https://api.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/3720018","assets_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/3720018/assets","upload_url":"https://uploads.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/3720018/assets{?name,label}","html_url":"https://github.com/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/tag/1.0.3","id":3720018,"node_id":"MDc6UmVsZWFzZTM3MjAwMTg=","tag_name":"1.0.3","target_commitish":"master","name":"1.0.3","draft":false,"author":{"login":"KSkun","id":5047602,"node_id":"MDQ6VXNlcjUwNDc2MDI=","avatar_url":"https://avatars2.githubusercontent.com/u/5047602?v=4","gravatar_id":"","url":"https://api.github.com/users/KSkun","html_url":"https://github.com/KSkun","followers_url":"https://api.github.com/users/KSkun/followers","following_url":"https://api.github.com/users/KSkun/following{/other_user}","gists_url":"https://api.github.com/users/KSkun/gists{/gist_id}","starred_url":"https://api.github.com/users/KSkun/starred{/owner}{/repo}","subscriptions_url":"https://api.github.com/users/KSkun/subscriptions","organizations_url":"https://api.github.com/users/KSkun/orgs","repos_url":"https://api.github.com/users/KSkun/repos","events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/KSkun/events{/privacy}","received_events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/KSkun/received_events","type":"User","site_admin":false},"prerelease":false,"created_at":"2016-07-22T15:46:38Z","published_at":"2016-07-22T16:27:55Z","assets":[{"url":"https://api.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/assets/2032592","id":2032592,"node_id":"MDEyOlJlbGVhc2VBc3NldDIwMzI1OTI=","name":"AcademyCraft-1.0.3.jar","label":null,"uploader":{"login":"KSkun","id":5047602,"node_id":"MDQ6VXNlcjUwNDc2MDI=","avatar_url":"https://avatars2.githubusercontent.com/u/5047602?v=4","gravatar_id":"","url":"https://api.github.com/users/KSkun","html_url":"https://github.com/KSkun","followers_url":"https://api.github.com/users/KSkun/followers","following_url":"https://api.github.com/users/KSkun/following{/other_user}","gists_url":"https://api.github.com/users/KSkun/gists{/gist_id}","starred_url":"https://api.github.com/users/KSkun/starred{/owner}{/repo}","subscriptions_url":"https://api.github.com/users/KSkun/subscriptions","organizations_url":"https://api.github.com/users/KSkun/orgs","repos_url":"https://api.github.com/users/KSkun/repos","events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/KSkun/events{/privacy}","received_events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/KSkun/received_events","type":"User","site_admin":false},"content_type":"application/octet-stream","state":"uploaded","size":28762527,"download_count":221,"created_at":"2016-07-22T16:25:31Z","updated_at":"2016-07-22T16:27:43Z","browser_download_url":"https://github.com/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/download/1.0.3/AcademyCraft-1.0.3.jar"}],"tarball_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/tarball/1.0.3","zipball_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/zipball/1.0.3","body":"#English\n\nAcademyCraft1.0.3bringsaboutlotsofenhancementsandbugfixes.TheVecDeviation/Reflectionskillsarerewrittentoimproveuseexperience.\n\n##Feature\n-MatterunitcannowputImagPhaseLiquidintoworld\n-Setofmetallicblocks&entitiesisnowconfigurable\n-DataTerminal'sUInowshowscurrenttime\n\n##Enhancement\n-ImplementedhopperpullingbehaviourforMetalFormer&ImagFusor\n-ImprovementsforVecDeviation/Reflection\n-Changedtextureofwaveeffect\n-Changetoswitchon-offstyleofcontrolling\n-Makelistofaffectedentitiesconfigurable\n-CancelknockbackifabsorbedalldamageforReflection\n-FixednoexpincreaseforReflection\n-Addedscreen-spaceeffecct\n\n##Bugfixes\n-FixedlogoinMisakaCloudnotshowingcompletely\n-FixedNEIrecipesupportdisplayforMetalFormer&ImagFusor\n-Fixedsometypoindataconfigfile\n-FixedexperiencecalculationforMagnetMovementandDimensionFoldingTheoremskills\n-FixedElectronBomb'seffectnotdisplaying\n-FixedteleportationofsurroundingentitiesforLocationTeleport\n-FixedsomepotentialissuesaboutCP/Overloadconsumption\n\n#简体中文\n\nAcademyCraft1.0.3带来了大量的细节改进和bug修复。矢量操作的矢量反射/偏移技能进行了大幅改进。\n\n##新特性\n-物质单元现在可以将虚相液体放置到世界中\n-添加了自定义金属方块&实体的选项\n-数据终端的UI现在会显示当前时间\n\n##改进\n-实现了金属处理机和虚能融合机的漏斗搬运行为\n-对矢量偏移/矢量反射技能的改进\n-修改了波动特效贴图的风格\n-将技能操作方式改为开关（而非长按）\n-现在可以自定义影响哪些实体了\n-如果反射技能吸收了所有的伤害，取消对使用者的击退\n-修复了反射技能的经验不增加\n\n##Bug修复\n-修复了御坂云终端的logo显示不完全\n-修复了金属处理机和虚能融合机的NEI合成表支持\n-修复了数据配置文件中的一些错字\n-修复了磁场牵引和空间折叠理论技能的经验值计算\n-修复了原子崩坏第一个技能的特效不显示\n-修复了定位传送对于使用者周边玩家的传送\n-修复了和CP/过载消耗的一些潜在问题\n"},{"url":"https://api.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/3595123","assets_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/3595123/assets","upload_url":"https://uploads.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/3595123/assets{?name,label}","html_url":"https://github.com/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/tag/1.0.2","id":3595123,"node_id":"MDc6UmVsZWFzZTM1OTUxMjM=","tag_name":"1.0.2","target_commitish":"master","name":"1.0.2","draft":false,"author":{"login":"WeAthFoLD","id":3516419,"node_id":"MDQ6VXNlcjM1MTY0MTk=","avatar_url":"https://avatars1.githubusercontent.com/u/3516419?v=4","gravatar_id":"","url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD","html_url":"https://github.com/WeAthFoLD","followers_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/followers","following_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/following{/other_user}","gists_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/gists{/gist_id}","starred_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/starred{/owner}{/repo}","subscriptions_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/subscriptions","organizations_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/orgs","repos_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/repos","events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/events{/privacy}","received_events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/received_events","type":"User","site_admin":false},"prerelease":false,"created_at":"2016-07-06T06:30:50Z","published_at":"2016-07-06T07:09:55Z","assets":[{"url":"https://api.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/assets/1948073","id":1948073,"node_id":"MDEyOlJlbGVhc2VBc3NldDE5NDgwNzM=","name":"AcademyCraft-1.0.2.jar","label":null,"uploader":{"login":"WeAthFoLD","id":3516419,"node_id":"MDQ6VXNlcjM1MTY0MTk=","avatar_url":"https://avatars1.githubusercontent.com/u/3516419?v=4","gravatar_id":"","url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD","html_url":"https://github.com/WeAthFoLD","followers_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/followers","following_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/following{/other_user}","gists_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/gists{/gist_id}","starred_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/starred{/owner}{/repo}","subscriptions_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/subscriptions","organizations_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/orgs","repos_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/repos","events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/events{/privacy}","received_events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/received_events","type":"User","site_admin":false},"content_type":"application/java-archive","state":"uploaded","size":28677423,"download_count":4368,"created_at":"2016-07-06T06:44:14Z","updated_at":"2016-07-06T07:09:07Z","browser_download_url":"https://github.com/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/download/1.0.2/AcademyCraft-1.0.2.jar"}],"tarball_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/tarball/1.0.2","zipball_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/zipball/1.0.2","body":"#English\n\nAcademyCraft1.0.2bringsaboutausefulnewfeature:**Abilitydatacustomization**.Thedataoflevelupgradingisadjustedtoreducegrinding.Alsothereareseveralrewrites,bugfixesandenhancements.\n\n##Features\n-Implementedfullabilitydatacustomization.Finditin`config/academy-craft-data.conf`afterstartingthegameonce.\n-AddoptiontodisableMisakaCloudTerminal'sautoacquire(#345).\n\n##Enhancements\n-Updatedzh_TWlang.\n-Rewrite**LocationTeleport**skill.\n-Rewritelevelprogresscalculationlogic.ItisnowbasedonskillexperenceincrementratherthanCPusage.\n-Improvedfontrenderinginlowerresolutions.\n-Rewritemediaplayer,fixsomesubtlebugs.(AlsoadjustedUIalittle)\n-Somecodeoptimization.Improvegameloadingspeed&networkperformance.\n-AddedlocalizationforSkillTreeconsoletexts.\n-Increasethespeedofabilitydevelopement.\n\n##Bugfixes\n-Fixbreakingcontainerblocksdoesn'tcloserelevantUI(#299).\n-Fixsomeunintendedfailurewhenresettingability.\n\n#简体中文\n\nAcademyCraft1.0.2带来了一个非常有用的功能：**技能数据自定义**；等级升级的数据经过调整，以减少游戏过程中的重复性；除此之外，还有一些代码重写、bug修复和功能改进。\n\n##新特性\n-实现了能力数据自定义。在启动游戏一次后，在`config/academy-craft-data.conf`可以找到设置文件。\n-添加了关闭自动给予御坂云终端的设置(#345)。\n\n##功能改进\n-更新了zh_TWlang。\n-重制了定位传送技能。\n-重写了玩家能力等级提升的机制：它现在基于技能熟练度的上升。\n-改进了低分辨率下的字体渲染。\n-重写了媒体播放器，修复了一些微妙的bug（同时轻微调整了UI）\n-一些代码优化，提高整体的计算&网络性能。\n-为能力开发机的控制台文字添加了本地化。\n-提高了开发机进行开发的速度。\n\n##Bug修复\n-修复了破坏方块不使打开的UI关闭(#299).\n-修复了能力重置时一些意料之外的失败。\n"},{"url":"https://api.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/3227657","assets_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/3227657/assets","upload_url":"https://uploads.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/3227657/assets{?name,label}","html_url":"https://github.com/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/tag/1.0.1","id":3227657,"node_id":"MDc6UmVsZWFzZTMyMjc2NTc=","tag_name":"1.0.1","target_commitish":"master","name":"1.0.1","draft":false,"author":{"login":"WeAthFoLD","id":3516419,"node_id":"MDQ6VXNlcjM1MTY0MTk=","avatar_url":"https://avatars1.githubusercontent.com/u/3516419?v=4","gravatar_id":"","url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD","html_url":"https://github.com/WeAthFoLD","followers_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/followers","following_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/following{/other_user}","gists_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/gists{/gist_id}","starred_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/starred{/owner}{/repo}","subscriptions_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/subscriptions","organizations_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/orgs","repos_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/repos","events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/events{/privacy}","received_events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/received_events","type":"User","site_admin":false},"prerelease":false,"created_at":"2016-05-14T17:44:55Z","published_at":"2016-05-15T02:56:31Z","assets":[{"url":"https://api.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/assets/1686088","id":1686088,"node_id":"MDEyOlJlbGVhc2VBc3NldDE2ODYwODg=","name":"AcademyCraft-1.0.1.jar","label":null,"uploader":{"login":"WeAthFoLD","id":3516419,"node_id":"MDQ6VXNlcjM1MTY0MTk=","avatar_url":"https://avatars1.githubusercontent.com/u/3516419?v=4","gravatar_id":"","url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD","html_url":"https://github.com/WeAthFoLD","followers_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/followers","following_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/following{/other_user}","gists_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/gists{/gist_id}","starred_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/starred{/owner}{/repo}","subscriptions_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/subscriptions","organizations_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/orgs","repos_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/repos","events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/events{/privacy}","received_events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/received_events","type":"User","site_admin":false},"content_type":"application/java-archive","state":"uploaded","size":28552832,"download_count":225,"created_at":"2016-05-15T02:52:19Z","updated_at":"2016-05-15T02:56:06Z","browser_download_url":"https://github.com/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/download/1.0.1/AcademyCraft-1.0.1.jar"}],"tarball_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/tarball/1.0.1","zipball_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/zipball/1.0.1","body":"#en_US\n\nSeveralenhancements&bugfixes.\n\n##Enhancements\n-AddGUIforenergybridges(#325)\n-Updateja_JP.langtonewestcontent\n-ImproveddescofStormWingtotellthatitbreaksblocks\n\n##Bugfixes\n-FixBasic&LuckMiningraycrash.(#327)\n-FixMetalFormerdoesn'tsaveinventory(#324)\n-FixMetalFormercan'tcyclemodeproperlywithsomemodsinstalled(#321)\n-FixMetalFormer'smodecycledirection(#331)\n-FixMetalFormerandImagFusorsoundstillplayingwhenbroken\n-FixTeleportercriticalhitcrashesgame\n-FixopeningWindGenBaseUIdoesn'tblockfurtheraction(#316)\n-FixclickingonsomestacksinUIswillcausethemtobedroppedoutimmediately\n-Fixwirelessuserslostconnectiononworldreload\n-Fixphaseliquiddoesn'tgenerateinotherworlds(e.g.Multiworldplugins)\n\n#zh_CN\n\n一些改进和bug修复。\n\n##功能改进\n-为能源桥添加了GUI(#325)\n-更新ja_JP.lang\n-改进了风翼技能的说明，以指出它会破坏周围的方块\n\n##Bug修复\n-修复了基础&时运采集光束崩溃(#327)\n-修复了金属合成机不保存物品栏(#324)\n-修复了金属合成机在与某些mod同时安装时无法切换模式(#321)\n-修复了金属合成机UI中切换模式按钮的方向(#331)\n-修复了机器方块在被破坏后音效仍在播放\n-修复了空间使的暴击使游戏崩溃\n-修复了在打开风力发电基座后，还能继续打开物品UI(#316)\n-修复了点击UI中的某些物品会让它们立刻被丢出\n-修复了在世界重新加载时无线连接信息丢失\n-修复了虚相位液体在其他主世界不生成(e.g.多世界插件生成的主世界)\n"},{"url":"https://api.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/3177811","assets_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/3177811/assets","upload_url":"https://uploads.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/3177811/assets{?name,label}","html_url":"https://github.com/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/tag/1.0.0","id":3177811,"node_id":"MDc6UmVsZWFzZTMxNzc4MTE=","tag_name":"1.0.0","target_commitish":"master","name":"1.0.0","draft":false,"author":{"login":"WeAthFoLD","id":3516419,"node_id":"MDQ6VXNlcjM1MTY0MTk=","avatar_url":"https://avatars1.githubusercontent.com/u/3516419?v=4","gravatar_id":"","url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD","html_url":"https://github.com/WeAthFoLD","followers_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/followers","following_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/following{/other_user}","gists_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/gists{/gist_id}","starred_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/starred{/owner}{/repo}","subscriptions_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/subscriptions","organizations_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/orgs","repos_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/repos","events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/events{/privacy}","received_events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/received_events","type":"User","site_admin":false},"prerelease":false,"created_at":"2016-05-07T14:00:00Z","published_at":"2016-05-07T14:55:06Z","assets":[{"url":"https://api.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/assets/1652940","id":1652940,"node_id":"MDEyOlJlbGVhc2VBc3NldDE2NTI5NDA=","name":"AcademyCraft-1.0.0.jar","label":null,"uploader":{"login":"WeAthFoLD","id":3516419,"node_id":"MDQ6VXNlcjM1MTY0MTk=","avatar_url":"https://avatars1.githubusercontent.com/u/3516419?v=4","gravatar_id":"","url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD","html_url":"https://github.com/WeAthFoLD","followers_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/followers","following_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/following{/other_user}","gists_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/gists{/gist_id}","starred_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/starred{/owner}{/repo}","subscriptions_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/subscriptions","organizations_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/orgs","repos_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/repos","events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/events{/privacy}","received_events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/received_events","type":"User","site_admin":false},"content_type":"application/java-archive","state":"uploaded","size":28551391,"download_count":469,"created_at":"2016-05-07T14:45:17Z","updated_at":"2016-05-07T14:46:32Z","browser_download_url":"https://github.com/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/download/1.0.0/AcademyCraft-1.0.0.jar"}],"tarball_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/tarball/1.0.0","zipball_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/zipball/1.0.0","body":"![]()\n\n#English\n\nFirstformalversionofAcademyCraft.Havefun!\n\nRequiredforgeversion:1.7.10-10.13.4.1517orhigher\n\nDependency:[LambdaLib1.2.0](https://github.com/LambdaInnovation/LambdaLib/releases/tag/1.2.0)\n\n##Features\n-Anewly-forgedabilitycategory:VectorManipulation!\n-MediaPlayerApp:Addedvolumeedit&trackcustomization\n-AcompleteUIreworkonallblocks,featuringamorecoolanduniforminterface\n-AddedAbilityInductionFactor:Andungeon-generateditemthatallowsonetochangecategory\n\n##Enhancements\n\n###Major\n-Completelyrewritenetworksynchronizationlogiconmanyplaces,improvenetworkperformance.\n-Providebetterdescriptionofwhatperksdo\n-Loweredlevelrequirementofperk'MindCourse'and'AdvancedMindCourse'.\n-ImprovedusagepermissionforMatrixandNode:Onlyplacerscanrename/changepasswordfornow.\n-Addedoptionalpasswordvalidationfornodes.\n-AddskillusingstatusdisplayforKeyHintUI:Itwillgiveyouhintwhentoreleaseaskillnow.\n-AddUIforSolarGenerator.\n-ChangethewayofrecordingCooldowntoavoidsomeproblems.\n-Addic2supporttoCurrentChargingofElectromaster.\n-Rewritethetutorial,renametoMisakaCloudTerminal.\n-ImproveMagnetManipulationofElectromaster,nowithassoundeffect.\n\n###Minor\n-HoldingVwillcauseCPBartodisplaynumericalCPandOverloaddata.\n-Addedspecialplayerkillchattextforskills\n-Using`/aim`commandinCreativeModedoesn'tforceyoutoset`/aimcheats_on`anymore\n-Oreswillnowspawninoverworldsofmulti-worldpluginsnormally.\n-Addreturntheresultofusingcoin.(openthisfeatureinDataTerminal)\n-Changethewaytocalculateoverload.\n-CPbarnowfadeswhenoverloadtoindicateabilityunavailable.\n-Add**FontCustomize**,finditincfgfile.\n-StopBGMwhenopenMediaPlayer.\n-Addexplanationaboutrequiredleveltolearnskills.\n-NowtheCPrecoverrateistripled.\n-ImprovedappearanceofImagPhaseGenerator.\n-UpdatethetextureofPortableDeveloper.\n\n##Bugfixes\n-Fixperksautomaticallylearnedwhenusingskills,andperkspotentiallynotworking.\n-FixAbilityDeveloperblockcausingmemoryoverflowinserverenvironment.\n-FixMetalFormer'smodebeingresetonworld/chunkreload(#261,#291)\n-Fixcoindoublingafterthrow(#255)\n-Fixcrystaloresdon'tsupportFortuneEnhancement(#263)\n-FixFlashingskillcausingdanglingghostsinworld(#285)\n-FixcrashmadebyMediaPlayer.\n-FixUIdisappearanceproblemcausedbyNEI.\n-FixlogicerrorwhencloseFrequencyTransmitter.(#270)\n-FixcrashcausedbyThermalFoundation.(#294)\n-Fixproblemswhenshift-clickingslots.\n-Fixabnormalenergyconversionrate.\n-FixproblemswithFlashing.\n-FixcannotaddwhitelistintoAbilityInterferencer\n-Fixanimeofnodeconnection.\n-Fixproblemswithoverload.Nowthesystemwillabsorttheskillwhenoverload.\n-Fixwirelessmachinecannnotconnecttonodewithpassword.\n-Fixcannotperformsomeskills.\n-Fixskillkeydeadlockwhentheplayerreborn.\n-FixcrashcausedbyLocationTeleport.\n-Fixsomeskillstillactiveafterreleasekey.\n-Fixsomeskillsdestroyblocksevenwhentheoptionisturnedoff.\n-FixabnormalvisuallengthofRayBarrage.\n-Fixmostservercrashcausedbyskills.\n-FixdamagecausedbyMagnetMovement.\n-FixCurrentChargingdoesn'tstopafterCPbarisempty.\n-FixDataTerminalGUIdoesn'tupdateafterinstallingApp.\n-FixcrashwhenrunningwithShadersmod.\n-Improvedtickingalgorithmofwirelessnetwork.\n-FixwrongconnectionamongNodesandMatrix.\n-FixwrongvisualeffectofMatrixandWindGenerator.\n-Fixcrashwhentrytogetitemsfromfusor.\n-FixwrongenergyconsuminginImagPhaseGenerator.\n-Fixsmallproblemaboutmemoryleaks.\n-Fixnodecannotdisplaynetworksituationcorrectly.\n-FixRFsupport.\n-Fixlotsofproblemscausedbycooldownsystem.(#310)\n-FixMeltdownercan'tbeusedinserver.(#309)\n\n#简体中文\n\n这是AcademyCraft的第一个正式版本。祝游戏愉快！\n\n要求的Forge版本:1.7.10-10.13.4.1517或更高\n\nDependency:[LambdaLib1.2.0](https://github.com/LambdaInnovation/LambdaLib/releases/tag/1.2.0)\n\n##特性添加\n-新能力系：矢量操作！\n-媒体播放器App：添加音量编辑和自定义音轨功能\n-对机器方块部分的完全UI重置，带来更加酷炫和易用的界面\n-添加了能力诱导因子：一个地牢生成的物品，允许玩家在获得能力后更换能力系。\n\n##功能改进\n\n###主要\n-重写了大部分的网络同步逻辑，提高了网络性能。\n-为被动能力的效果提供了更好的说明。\n-降低了“大脑训练课程”和“高级大脑训练课程”的学习等级需求。\n-改进了矩阵和节点的使用权限：现在只有放置者可以更改其名称和密码。\n-为无线节点添加了可选的密码验证。\n-在键位提示UI处添加了技能状态指示：你可以通过图标的状态查看技能的蓄力/释放情况。\n-现在CD会在服务端计算。修正了重进服务器CD重置等一系列的问题。\n\n###次要\n-长按技能激活键会让CP指示条显示CP和过载的数值。\n-添加了技能的击杀提示。\n-在创造模式使用`/aim`技能不会再强制要求你开启`/aimcheats_on`了。\n-在多世界插件的情况下，应该也可以正常生成矿物了。\n-抛硬币现在可以返回硬币结果。（在数据终端设置里开启）\n-调整了过载的计算逻辑。\n-CP条在过载回复时颜色会减淡，以提示玩家无法使用。\n-添加了**字体自定义**功能。可以在cfg中找到相关选项。\n-添加了所有GUI的本地化文字。\n-媒体播放器开始播放时，会停止MC的背景音乐。\n-开发机和技能树app的图片显示会加以区分。\n-改进了玩家能力经验条的显示，并且添加了文字说明。\n-添加了技能的需求等级说明。\n-CP回复速度提高为原来的3倍。\n-稍稍调整了虚相发电机的外观。\n-更新了便携开发机的材质以同步最新UI。\n\n##Bug修复\n-修复了被动能力自动被学习，以及无效的情况\n-修复了能力开发机在多人环境下导致内存溢出\n-修复了金属处理机在世界/区块重新加载时模式被重置(#261,#291)\n-修复了硬币在丢出后无法和原来的堆叠(#255)\n-修复了某些矿物不支持时运附魔(#263)\n-修复了高速闪现技能使用后留下人影(#285)\n-修复媒体播放器在游戏环境崩溃\n-修复NEI挡住UI部分区域\n-添加电气使系名中文lang\n-修复频率变送器的退出的逻辑错误（#270）\n-修复和ThermalFoundation一起安装时崩溃（#294）\n-修复了和Shift点击槽位判断相关的一系列问题\n-修复了能源传输速率高于标称值的问题\n-修复了高速闪现技能的一系列错误，包括一直没成功修复的人影问题\n-修复了能力干涉方块无法添加玩家\n-修复了节点连接状态的动画\n-修复了技能过载时的一系列触发机制。在过载时会结束蓄力技能和特殊技能\n-修复了无线用电器无法连接到加密的节点\n-修复了电磁炮等技能无法释放的问题\n-修复了玩家死亡后重生，技能按键仍然未被释放\n-修复了坐标传送导致崩溃\n-修复了部分技能在松开按键后仍然继续运行（显示cp消耗提示）\n-修复了冷却相关的一些问题\n-修复了在技能树UI中，没学习技能时也会提示输入learn指令\n-修复了某些技能不受destroyBlocks选项的影响\n-修复了原子崩坏系散射光束雨技能当没打到半导体时光束长度计算不正确\n-修复了绝大部分技能适用造成服务端崩溃的问题\n-修复了磁场移动带来奇怪的掉落伤害\n-修复电流回充在CP消耗完毕后不停止\n-修复了在打开数据终端时安装app，数据终端页面不会更新\n-修复了和光影同时打开的崩溃\n-调整了无线网的算法，修复了破坏方块后连接信息扔驻留的问题\n-搜索无线网时，不会显示无法连接到的节点/矩阵\n-提高了一些方块的同步距离，解决了矩阵金属板不显示和风力风扇不显示的问题\n-修复了磁场操作**和崩溃\n-修复了从熔炉拿出来一些mod内物品时崩溃\n-修复了虚相发电机空转（不工作但消耗能量）\n-修复了一些小的内存泄露问题\n-修复了节点方块没有正确的显示网络状态\n-修复了一些特效的显示细节\n-修复了电流回充技能对RF能源方块的支持\n-修复了冷却系统相关的许多问题。(#310)\n-修复了矢量操控在混淆环境中不正常工作的问题。(#311)\n-修复了服务端无法使用原子崩坏。(#309)\n"},{"url":"https://api.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/2516238","assets_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/2516238/assets","upload_url":"https://uploads.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/2516238/assets{?name,label}","html_url":"https://github.com/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/tag/1.0pr3_1","id":2516238,"node_id":"MDc6UmVsZWFzZTI1MTYyMzg=","tag_name":"1.0pr3_1","target_commitish":"master","name":"1.0pr3_1","draft":false,"author":{"login":"WeAthFoLD","id":3516419,"node_id":"MDQ6VXNlcjM1MTY0MTk=","avatar_url":"https://avatars1.githubusercontent.com/u/3516419?v=4","gravatar_id":"","url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD","html_url":"https://github.com/WeAthFoLD","followers_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/followers","following_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/following{/other_user}","gists_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/gists{/gist_id}","starred_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/starred{/owner}{/repo}","subscriptions_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/subscriptions","organizations_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/orgs","repos_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/repos","events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/events{/privacy}","received_events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/received_events","type":"User","site_admin":false},"prerelease":false,"created_at":"2016-01-29T13:28:52Z","published_at":"2016-01-30T05:15:10Z","assets":[{"url":"https://api.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/assets/1259925","id":1259925,"node_id":"MDEyOlJlbGVhc2VBc3NldDEyNTk5MjU=","name":"AcademyCraft-1.0pr3_1.jar","label":null,"uploader":{"login":"WeAthFoLD","id":3516419,"node_id":"MDQ6VXNlcjM1MTY0MTk=","avatar_url":"https://avatars1.githubusercontent.com/u/3516419?v=4","gravatar_id":"","url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD","html_url":"https://github.com/WeAthFoLD","followers_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/followers","following_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/following{/other_user}","gists_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/gists{/gist_id}","starred_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/starred{/owner}{/repo}","subscriptions_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/subscriptions","organizations_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/orgs","repos_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/repos","events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/events{/privacy}","received_events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/received_events","type":"User","site_admin":false},"content_type":"application/java-archive","state":"uploaded","size":27131188,"download_count":238,"created_at":"2016-01-30T04:40:23Z","updated_at":"2016-01-30T05:08:20Z","browser_download_url":"https://github.com/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/download/1.0pr3_1/AcademyCraft-1.0pr3_1.jar"}],"tarball_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/tarball/1.0pr3_1","zipball_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/zipball/1.0pr3_1","body":"##en_US\n\n#Briefing\n\nLotsofbugfixesandsomeminorenhancements.\n\nServerisnowplayableandshouldcausenoserioustroubles.\n\nRecommendedForgeversion:1.7.10-10.13.4.1517orhigher\n\nDependency:[LambdaLib1.1.1](https://github.com/LambdaInnovation/LambdaLib/releases/tag/1.1.1)\n\n#Changelog\n\n##Feature\n-Addversionupdatenotification\n-AddHUDUIpositioncustomization,accessiblefromSettingsApp\n\n##Enhancement\n-Lotsofcodecleanup\n-RewrittenpartofabilityAPI\n-TheFlashingskillnowcanbeactivatedwithotherskillsstillusable\n-AddedsmeltingrecipedisplayforResearchNote\n-ResearchNote'snewitemactivationnowtriggersanUInotification\n-UpdatedallfontrenderingtousingTrueType\n-AddedMetalFormerrecipetodoubletheimagcrystalfromore\n-Makeshadercompilationfailgracefully,machinesthatdoesn'tsupportshadercanalsorunthemod\n\n##Bugfix\n-Fixoutrightcrashinserver(#231)\n-Fixresonantcrystalore'smetalformerrecipe(#238)\n-FixBlockDevelopercrashingwithNEI(#237)\n-FixoutrightcrashwhenLambdaLibisnotinstalled(#231)\n-Fixwindgeneratorwirelessiconposition(#228)\n-FixsomeblockcanplaceandopenGUIatoneright-click(#202)\n-FixabunchoferrorrelatedtoPlayerDatanullpointer(#230,#232,#239)\n-Fixbraincourseskillnotimprovingwhenskillexpisfull(#214)\n\n##zh_CN\n\n#概要\n\n大量的bug修复和一些小的功能更新。现在可以在服务端运行而不造成大的问题了。\n\n推荐的Forge版本：1.7.10-10.13.4.1517或更高\n\n依赖：[LambdaLib1.1.1](https://github.com/LambdaInnovation/LambdaLib/releases/tag/1.1.1)\n\n#更新日志\n\n##新特性\n-添加了版本升级检查\n-添加了游戏内UI位置自定义，可以从设置App打开\n\n##功能改进\n-大量的代码清理……\n-重写了一部分能力API\n-现在高速闪现能力在激活后可以与预设中的技能一起使用了\n-添加了研究笔记的熔炼合成显示\n-研究笔记新条目的激活现在会触发一个UI提示\n-把所有字体渲染替换为TrueType\n-添加了通过金属处理机处理虚相水晶矿的合成\n-让shader编译失败静默，不支持shader的机器也可以运行mod了\n\n##Bugfix\n-修复服务器启动时崩溃(#231)\n-修复了谐振水晶矿的金属合成机合成表(#238)\n-修复了使用能力开发机时在服务器端的崩溃(#237)\n-修复在LambdaLib没有安装时游戏闪退(#231)\n-修复风力发电机无线图标的位置(#228)\n-修复某些方块会在右击时同时放置方块和打开GUI(#202)\n-修复了和PlayerData相关的一堆崩溃(#230,#232,#239)\n-修复了在技能经验值为满时大脑训练课程技能熟练度不提高(#214)\n"},{"url":"https://api.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/2364732","assets_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/2364732/assets","upload_url":"https://uploads.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/2364732/assets{?name,label}","html_url":"https://github.com/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/tag/1.0pr3","id":2364732,"node_id":"MDc6UmVsZWFzZTIzNjQ3MzI=","tag_name":"1.0pr3","target_commitish":"master","name":"1.0pr3","draft":false,"author":{"login":"WeAthFoLD","id":3516419,"node_id":"MDQ6VXNlcjM1MTY0MTk=","avatar_url":"https://avatars1.githubusercontent.com/u/3516419?v=4","gravatar_id":"","url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD","html_url":"https://github.com/WeAthFoLD","followers_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/followers","following_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/following{/other_user}","gists_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/gists{/gist_id}","starred_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/starred{/owner}{/repo}","subscriptions_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/subscriptions","organizations_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/orgs","repos_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/repos","events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/events{/privacy}","received_events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/received_events","type":"User","site_admin":false},"prerelease":true,"created_at":"2016-01-03T13:22:00Z","published_at":"2016-01-03T13:45:56Z","assets":[{"url":"https://api.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/assets/1172524","id":1172524,"node_id":"MDEyOlJlbGVhc2VBc3NldDExNzI1MjQ=","name":"AcademyCraft-1.0pr3.jar","label":null,"uploader":{"login":"WeAthFoLD","id":3516419,"node_id":"MDQ6VXNlcjM1MTY0MTk=","avatar_url":"https://avatars1.githubusercontent.com/u/3516419?v=4","gravatar_id":"","url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD","html_url":"https://github.com/WeAthFoLD","followers_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/followers","following_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/following{/other_user}","gists_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/gists{/gist_id}","starred_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/starred{/owner}{/repo}","subscriptions_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/subscriptions","organizations_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/orgs","repos_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/repos","events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/events{/privacy}","received_events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/received_events","type":"User","site_admin":false},"content_type":"application/java-archive","state":"uploaded","size":27131504,"download_count":228,"created_at":"2016-01-03T13:35:28Z","updated_at":"2016-01-03T13:40:03Z","browser_download_url":"https://github.com/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/download/1.0pr3/AcademyCraft-1.0pr3.jar"}],"tarball_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/tarball/1.0pr3","zipball_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/zipball/1.0pr3","body":"##en_US\n\nHappynewyear!\n\n#Releasenote\n\n1.0pr3madeamajorrewritetoGUIFontAPIs.NowprovidesmuchbetterlookingthroughTrueTypefonts.Notalloccurencesarereplacedthough.\n\nAlsoaddedthetutorialsystemasanexperimentalfeature.Thecontentsofthetutorialwillbepolishedinfurtherversions.\n\nNotethat1.0pr3ispossiblyNOTcompatiblewithpreviousversions'saves.Pleasebackup\nyourworldbeforereplacing.\n\n**WARNING**:1.0pr3isnotthouroughlytestedandispossiblyunstable.Pleasebecareful.\n\nRecommendedForgevesion:`1.7.10-10.13.4.1558`orhigher\nDependency:[LambdaLib1.1.0](https://github.com/LambdaInnovation/LambdaLib/releases/tag/1.1.0)\n\n#Changelog\n\n##NewFeatures\n-AbilityInterfererforadmins\n-In-modtutorialsystem(experimental)\n\n##Enhancements\n-ChangedallfontrenderingtoTTFrenderer,greatlyimprovedvisualquality.\n\n##Bugfixes\n-Fixedmissingrecipe(s)withsomeothermodsinstalled(e.g.Forestry,OpenComputers)\n\n##Misc\n-Lotsofrefactorsandcleanupunderthemask.Preperationforfuturestuffs:-)\n\n##zh_CN\n\n新年快乐！\n\n#更新概要\n\n1.0pr3对字体API进行了完全重写。通过使用TrueType字体带来更加清晰的文字效果。接下来的版本将会完全替换所有的字体渲染。\n\n同时完成了作为实验特性的教程系统。在以后的版本中我们还会持续改进和完善它。\n\n最后，你们一直要的能力干涉方块XD再也不用怕服务器里的熊孩子了\n\n注意：1.0pr3和之前的版本存档可能不兼容。请在替换mod前备份存档。\n\n**警告**：1.0pr3更改的代码量比较大，可能不是非常稳定，请在使用时多加小心。\n\n推荐的Forge版本：1.7.10-10.13.4.1558或更高\n\n依赖：[LambdaLib1.1.0](https://github.com/LambdaInnovation/LambdaLib/releases/tag/1.1.0)\n\n#更新日志\n\n##新特性\n-能力干涉方块（管理员用）\n-内置教程系统（实验性）\n\n##改进\n-把所有的字体渲染改用TTFRenderer，大幅提升了视觉效果。\n\n##Bug修复\n-修复和某些mod混合安装时出现合成表缺失的问题（e.g.林业、OpenComputers）\n\n##其他\n-大量的代码重构和清理，为接下来的内容更新做准备\n"},{"url":"https://api.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/2364651","assets_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/2364651/assets","upload_url":"https://uploads.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/2364651/assets{?name,label}","html_url":"https://github.com/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/tag/1.0pr2","id":2364651,"node_id":"MDc6UmVsZWFzZTIzNjQ2NTE=","tag_name":"1.0pr2","target_commitish":"master","name":"1.0pr2","draft":false,"author":{"login":"WeAthFoLD","id":3516419,"node_id":"MDQ6VXNlcjM1MTY0MTk=","avatar_url":"https://avatars1.githubusercontent.com/u/3516419?v=4","gravatar_id":"","url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD","html_url":"https://github.com/WeAthFoLD","followers_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/followers","following_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/following{/other_user}","gists_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/gists{/gist_id}","starred_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/starred{/owner}{/repo}","subscriptions_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/subscriptions","organizations_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/orgs","repos_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/repos","events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/events{/privacy}","received_events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/received_events","type":"User","site_admin":false},"prerelease":false,"created_at":"2015-10-25T07:42:05Z","published_at":"2016-01-03T13:09:40Z","assets":[{"url":"https://api.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/assets/1172393","id":1172393,"node_id":"MDEyOlJlbGVhc2VBc3NldDExNzIzOTM=","name":"AcademyCraft-1.0pr2.jar","label":null,"uploader":{"login":"WeAthFoLD","id":3516419,"node_id":"MDQ6VXNlcjM1MTY0MTk=","avatar_url":"https://avatars1.githubusercontent.com/u/3516419?v=4","gravatar_id":"","url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD","html_url":"https://github.com/WeAthFoLD","followers_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/followers","following_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/following{/other_user}","gists_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/gists{/gist_id}","starred_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/starred{/owner}{/repo}","subscriptions_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/subscriptions","organizations_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/orgs","repos_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/repos","events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/events{/privacy}","received_events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/received_events","type":"User","site_admin":false},"content_type":"application/java-archive","state":"uploaded","size":26186944,"download_count":212,"created_at":"2016-01-03T10:51:04Z","updated_at":"2016-01-03T11:13:57Z","browser_download_url":"https://github.com/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/download/1.0pr2/AcademyCraft-1.0pr2.jar"}],"tarball_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/tarball/1.0pr2","zipball_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/zipball/1.0pr2","body":"##Lang:en_US\n\n##Bugfixes\n-Fixed`/aimexp`commandtakingout-of-rangevalues\n-Fixed`/aim`commandcheats_on/offswitchbeingresetwhenplayerisdead\n-FixedsomeitemsnotrenderedcorrectlyinItemFrame\n-Fixedcan'tquitGUIwith'E'keyusingnode\n-Fixedwirelessmatrixinventoryflashing\n-FixedignoringsurroundingblockswhileplacingAbilityDeveloper\n-FixednotcorrectlyconsumingliquidsusingPhaseGenerator\n-FixedRailgunskillnotcorrectlyconsumingstackswithironblock/ingot\n-Fixednodename'editable'inenergyblocks'linkGUIs\n-Fixedperksautomaticallylearned\n-FixedabilitydeveloperUIopeningforALLclientswhileopeningbyONEplayer\n-Fixeditemscraftedwithinvalidsubtypeid(65535)\n-Fixedphaseliquidappearsasmissing-textureinsomesituation(MostnotablyBuildCraftTanks)\n-Fixedflashingwhileholdingblocksandrightclickingsomeofthemodblocks.(e.g.Nodes)\n-FixednameandconnectionlossofWirelessNode\n-FixedcanrecoverCPbylyingonthebedandleavebed\n-FixedslightGUIplacementerrorofMetalFormer\n-Fixedsomeskillscan'thurtdragonorsomeotherentities\n\n##Enhancements\n-NowJAVA7COMPATIBLE\n-Removedtheredundant'preset'command\n-Make'aim'command'shintsmorefriendly\n-Improvedja_JP.lang\n-Addedshift-clickbehaviorforPhaseGenerator\n-AdjustedapplyingrangeofArcGeneration\n-AddcursorforDataTerminal,improvevisualeffect\n-Addedlink-to-nodeUIforAbilityDeveloper,SolarGenerator,EU&RFconvertingmodules\n-MineRaysnowaccountsfordestroyBlocksflagandAcademyBukkitResidencesupport\n-Addedsomemachineworkingsounds.\n-ChangeImagFusortocorrectlyidentifyItemStackdamagevalue\n-Adjustedorespawningrate.\n-AddedsomeOreDictsformodmaterials\n-RFSupportmoduledoesn'tanymorerequireThermalExpansion\n\n##NewFeatures\n-MineTweaker3supportby3TUSK\n-Added'ResonantCrystalOre'\n-Addedapreviewfor'ResearchNote'\n\n##Lang:zh_CN\n\n##Bug修复\n-修复`/aimexp`指令接受越界的值\n-修复`/aim`指令的开关在玩家死亡时重置\n-修复一些物品不能正确在物品展示框里渲染\n-修复不能通过'E'键退出节点\n-修复无线矩阵物品栏闪烁\n-修复在放置能力开发机时无视（直接覆盖）周围的方块\n-修复使用虚相发电机时没有正确的消耗`ItemStack`\n-修复在使用铁锭/铁块发射超电磁炮时，物品没有被正确销毁\n-修复在连接到节点UI中，节点的名字\"可编辑\"\n-修复自动学习被动技能\n-修复打开能力开发机（方块）时在所有客户端打开\n-修复一些物品以不正确的damage-value被合成(65535)\n-修复虚相液体在某些情况下显示为缺失贴图（比如BuildCraft的水槽）\n-修复手持方块在对某些方块右键时出现闪烁\n-修复了节点的名字不会保存和节点的网络连接丢失\n-修复了躺在床上醒来也会回复CP\n-修复金属处理机的轻微GUI错位\n-修复一些技能无法伤害龙和部分其他实体\n\n##功能改进\n-现在兼容JAVA7了！\n-移除了多余的`preset`指令\n-让`aim`指令的提示更加友好\n-改进ja_JP.lang\n-添加虚相发电机的shift+左击动作\n-修改了电弧激发技能的作用距离\n-给数据终端添加光标，改进视觉效果\n-给太阳能发电机、能力开发机（方块）、EU和RF转换方块添加了主动连接界面\n-采矿光束现在会考虑destroyBlocks选项以及AcademyBukkit的领地支持\n-虚能融合机现在会正确的处理物品附加值\n-添加了一些机器工作的音效\n-调整了矿物生成率\n-添加了一些材料的矿物词典\n-RF支持模块现在不再依赖于ThermalExpansion\n\n##功能添加\n-MineTweaker3支持by3TUSK\n-添加“谐振水晶矿”\n-添加“研究记录”的预览\n"},{"url":"https://api.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/2315710","assets_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/2315710/assets","upload_url":"https://uploads.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/2315710/assets{?name,label}","html_url":"https://github.com/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/tag/1.0pr1","id":2315710,"node_id":"MDc6UmVsZWFzZTIzMTU3MTA=","tag_name":"1.0pr1","target_commitish":"master","name":"1.0pr1","draft":false,"author":{"login":"WeAthFoLD","id":3516419,"node_id":"MDQ6VXNlcjM1MTY0MTk=","avatar_url":"https://avatars1.githubusercontent.com/u/3516419?v=4","gravatar_id":"","url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD","html_url":"https://github.com/WeAthFoLD","followers_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/followers","following_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/following{/other_user}","gists_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/gists{/gist_id}","starred_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/starred{/owner}{/repo}","subscriptions_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/subscriptions","organizations_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/orgs","repos_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/repos","events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/events{/privacy}","received_events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/received_events","type":"User","site_admin":false},"prerelease":false,"created_at":"2015-09-18T18:53:46Z","published_at":"2016-01-03T13:28:10Z","assets":[{"url":"https://api.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/assets/1144283","id":1144283,"node_id":"MDEyOlJlbGVhc2VBc3NldDExNDQyODM=","name":"AcademyCraft-1.0pr1.jar","label":null,"uploader":{"login":"WeAthFoLD","id":3516419,"node_id":"MDQ6VXNlcjM1MTY0MTk=","avatar_url":"https://avatars1.githubusercontent.com/u/3516419?v=4","gravatar_id":"","url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD","html_url":"https://github.com/WeAthFoLD","followers_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/followers","following_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/following{/other_user}","gists_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/gists{/gist_id}","starred_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/starred{/owner}{/repo}","subscriptions_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/subscriptions","organizations_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/orgs","repos_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/repos","events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/events{/privacy}","received_events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/WeAthFoLD/received_events","type":"User","site_admin":false},"content_type":"application/java-archive","state":"uploaded","size":25437562,"download_count":260,"created_at":"2015-12-19T11:26:01Z","updated_at":"2015-12-19T11:39:30Z","browser_download_url":"https://github.com/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/releases/download/1.0pr1/AcademyCraft-1.0pr1.jar"}],"tarball_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/tarball/1.0pr1","zipball_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/LambdaInnovation/AcademyCraft/zipball/1.0pr1","body":"##en_US\n\nFirstprereleaseversionofAcademyCraft.Contentsincluding:\n-WirelessEnergySystem\n-AbilitySystem\n-DataTerminal\n-SkillTree\n-ElectroMaster\n-MeltDowner\n-Teleporter\n-AchievementSystem\n-CraftingSystem\n-Crossmod/pluginsupport(NEI,IC2,ThermalExpansion,Residence,ShaderMod)\n\n##zh_CN\n\n首个预发布版本。内容包括：\n-无线能源系统\n-超能力系统\n-数据终端\n-技能树\n-电气使\n-原子崩坏\n-空间传送\n-成就系统\n-合成系统\n-跨Mod/插件支持（NEI、IC2、TE、领地、ShaderMod）\n"}]
